BBEX3.M.MWK.EUR.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in Malawi  / EUR 1 = MWK ... (middle)
Source: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the Reserve Bank of Malawi, Lilongwe.
Comment on 2010-01: Exchange rate as of 22 January 2010.

Comment on 2012-05: On 7 May 2012, the Malawi kwacha was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate):  4 May 2012: EUR 1 = MWK 216.4162 / 220.7882   7 May 2012: EUR 1 = MWK 322.0718 / 328.5783  Calculated devaluation: 32.8%.
